oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: School buses; Water towers
Education - Tennessee; Education - History - Tennessee; School buildings - Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Side view of a Hickman County school bus. In the background is a water tower.
By the 1930s, school buses were in use in Hickman County, and the number of rural schools decreased. By the 1950s, there were only 49 elementary schools remaining.
